text: jab ham logon ko unake kisee takaleef mein padane ke pashchaat dayaaluta ka rasaasvaadan karaate hai to ve hamaaree aayaton ke vishay mein chaalabaaziyaan karane lag jaate hai. kah do, "allaah kee chaal zyaada tez hai." nissandeh, jo chaalabaajiyaan tum kar rahe ho, hamaare bheje hue (farishte) unako likhate ja rahe hai
